title: TIP9 - Tokenlon new asset listing (Tokenlon 新资产支持)
body:
**Background**
* Tokenlon protocol currently adopts a whitelist approach for listing new assets. The core team collects candidate assets from the community and checks liquidity before the listing. 
* The core team is starting to add governance procedures from this batch of asset listings to involve the community in the listing process. The community can now vote on the proposal to decide on the new asset listing.
* Proposed new assets to support:

| Token | Contract Address |
| :---   | :---   |
| AAVE | 0x7fc66500c84a76ad7e9c93437bfc5ac33e2ddae9 |
| ALPHA | 0xa1faa113cbe53436df28ff0aee54275c13b40975 |
|BADGER|0x3472a5a71965499acd81997a54bba8d852c6e53d|
|BNT|0x1f573d6fb3f13d689ff844b4ce37794d79a7ff1c|
|BOND|0x0391d2021f89dc339f60fff84546ea23e337750f|
|ENJ|0xf629cbd94d3791c9250152bd8dfbdf380e2a3b9c|
|FTM|0x4e15361fd6b4bb609fa63c81a2be19d873717870|
|GRT|0xc944e90c64b2c07662a292be6244bdf05cda44a7|
|MATIC|0x7d1afa7b718fb893db30a3abc0cfc608aacfebb0|
|MEME|0xd5525d397898e5502075ea5e830d8914f6f0affe|
|NFTX|0x87d73e916d7057945c9bcd8cdd94e42a6f47f776|
|RAI|0x03ab458634910aad20ef5f1c8ee96f1d6ac54919|
|SAND|0x3845badade8e6dff049820680d1f14bd3903a5d0|
|SRM|0x476c5e26a75bd202a9683ffd34359c0cc15be0ff|
|WHALE|0x9355372396e3f6daf13359b7b607a3374cc638e0|

**Goal**
* Let the community decide on the new asset listing

**Proposed Action Items**
* Implement after the voting result is out, the exact time will depend on the preparation

**Voting Rules**
* Addresses with more than 0 LON can vote
* Addresses participating liquidity mining can vote (including unclaimed LON reward)
* Addresses with LON LP token can vote
* LON balance snapshot block: 12015825
* Voting start time: 2021.3.11 7:00 UTC
* Voting end time: 2021.3.12 7:00 UTC

**Voting Options**
* A. For, list these new assets
* B. Against, don’t list these new assets

---

**背景**
* Tokenlon 协议目前采用白名单上币方式，由核心团队从社区收集候选资产并检查流动性后执行上币。
* 为了引入社区参与决策，核心团队从本期上币开始加入治理流程，由社区投票决定新资产支持。
* 本期提议新增支持资产：

| 代币 | 合约地址 |
| :---   | :---   |
| AAVE | 0x7fc66500c84a76ad7e9c93437bfc5ac33e2ddae9 |
| ALPHA | 0xa1faa113cbe53436df28ff0aee54275c13b40975 |
|BADGER|0x3472a5a71965499acd81997a54bba8d852c6e53d|
|BNT|0x1f573d6fb3f13d689ff844b4ce37794d79a7ff1c|
|BOND|0x0391d2021f89dc339f60fff84546ea23e337750f|
|ENJ|0xf629cbd94d3791c9250152bd8dfbdf380e2a3b9c|
|FTM|0x4e15361fd6b4bb609fa63c81a2be19d873717870|
|GRT|0xc944e90c64b2c07662a292be6244bdf05cda44a7|
|MATIC|0x7d1afa7b718fb893db30a3abc0cfc608aacfebb0|
|MEME|0xd5525d397898e5502075ea5e830d8914f6f0affe|
|NFTX|0x87d73e916d7057945c9bcd8cdd94e42a6f47f776|
|RAI|0x03ab458634910aad20ef5f1c8ee96f1d6ac54919|
|SAND|0x3845badade8e6dff049820680d1f14bd3903a5d0|
|SRM|0x476c5e26a75bd202a9683ffd34359c0cc15be0ff|
|WHALE|0x9355372396e3f6daf13359b7b607a3374cc638e0|

**目的**
* 由社区投票决定新资产支持

**提案执行项**
* 根据提案投票结果尽快实施，生效时间根据实际准备情况决定

**投票规则**
* 持有 LON 大于 0 的地址能够参与本次治理投票
* 参与 LON 流动性挖矿的地址能够参与本次治理投票（包含未领取 LON 奖励）
* 持有 LON LP 代币大于 0 的地址能够参与本次治理投票
* LON 持有量快照区块高度：12015825
* 治理投票开启时间：2021.3.11 15:00 UTC+8
* 治理投票结束时间：2021.3.12 15:00 UTC+8

**投票选项**
* A. 支持，上线这些币种
* B. 反对，不上线这些币种
author: 0x25A087dC3512e3BE548F0cA13233ae29d3781bdC
